item.description:
Mosaic Commons is hosting a celebration starting at sunset and going into the evening:
Sunset: We'll light a candle at sunset on Friday, December 21. Gather in the Great Room at 4:10 pm for a 4:18 pm sunset.

Light from the Darkness: We'll once again do our traditional spiraling-in-and-out ritual, this year in the Great Room. Bring a candle in a jar. We'll plan to fill the candles with our wishes for the coming year as we walk the spiral. Gather in the Common House at 8 pm on 12/21 for this ritual.

Social/sing/celebrate: Join us in the Great Room for hanging out, hot cider, and warm food. Singing is not mandatory :) Games have been known to happen. We should be into this part by 8:45 pm or so; all are welcome. If you have dietary restrictions, let us know.

group.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons & Camelot Cohousing

item.name: Solstice Celebration!
